definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
pinyin: nong2 cun1 jia1 ting2 lian2 chan3 cheng2 bao1 ze2 ren4 zhi4
containing_words.word: 農村家庭聯產承包責任制

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of the nurse post responsibility model.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討實施“護士崗位責任制”的方法與效果。

sentences.english: We will implement the administrative law enforcement accountability system to strengthen and improve administrative law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 加強和改善行政執法，落實行政執法責任制。

sentences.english: This is what is meant by stewardship and accountability.
sentences.chinese: 這就是管理工作和責任制的意義。

sentences.english: Mr Holder’s announcement may even herald a new era of accountability.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾德的聲明或許更預示着責任制新時代的到來。

sentences.english: Democratic accountability has become a secondary virtue, desirable but expendable.
sentences.chinese: 民主的責任制已經成爲可有可無的次要美德。

sentences.english: Modify the job description of both the chief and the subordinate of this section, to meet changes.
sentences.chinese: 根據工作變化，適時修改本崗位和下屬的崗位責任制。

sentences.english: Chapter four is the thought of household responsibility system.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是家庭聯產承包責任制思想。

sentences.english: We will diligently follow the accountability system for product quality and safety.
sentences.chinese: 認真落實產品質量安全責任制。

sentences.english: Contracted responsibility system is an effective system at present for invigorating the enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 承包責任制是現階段搞活企業的有效形式。

sentences.english: We will implement the accountability system for workplace safety and resolutely prevent serious and major accidents.
sentences.chinese: 落實生產安全責任制，堅決遏制重特大安全事故發生。

sentences.english: Campos is a strong proponent of employee accountability.
sentences.chinese: 坎波斯是員工責任制的強烈支持者。

sentences.english: The farmer household contract responsibility system has formed the micro-organization of rural economy in China.
sentences.chinese: 家庭承包責任制重塑了農村經濟組織的微觀基礎。

sentences.english: Administrative organs must set up strict responsibility system, so as to improve administrative efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 管理機關必須建立嚴格的責任制才能提高管理效能。

definition: to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
taxation/in former times, esp. land tax
responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility
